Metadata.Title: CVE-2021-22569 affecting package python-tensorboard for versions less than 2.16.2-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2021-22569 affecting package python-tensorboard for versions less than 2.16.2-2. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package python-tensorboard is earlier than 2.16.2-2, affected by CVE-2021-22569
